title: Carl Crossgrove
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018071412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018071412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Designers) : Carl Crossgrove**

Type designer from San Francisco, [California](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018071412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/California). Crossgrove has designed fonts for [Adobe](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018071412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Adobe), [ITC](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018071412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/ITC), and [Monotype](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018071412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Monotype).

Typefaces by Carl Crossgrove:  
 [Beorcana](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018071412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Beorcana) 2006  
 [ITC Minska](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018071412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/ITC%20Minska)  
 [Mundo Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018071412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Mundo%20Sans)  
 [Origami](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018071412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Origami)  
 [Reliq](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018071412/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Reliq)

URL: [http://terrestrialdesign.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018071412/http:/terrestrialdesign.com/ "http://terrestrialdesign.com")

[Typophile User Profile: Crossgrove](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018071412/http:/typophile.com/user/2263)  
 [Fonts.com Designer Profile: Carl Crossgrove](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018071412/http:/www.fonts.com/AboutFonts/DesignerProfiles/CarlCrossgrove.htm)
author: paul d hunt
